{"step_by_step_thinking": "ASOM stands for Acute Suppurative Otitis Media, which is an infection of the middle ear. The most common organisms causing ASOM in children are Streptococcus pneumoniae and Haemophilus influenzae. Therefore, the likely infecting organism in a 4-year-old child with ASOM is either A. Pneumococcus or B. H.influenza.", "answer_choice": "A/B"}
